statements: SELECT * FROM pledges WHERE pledge_amount > 1000
SELECT user_id, pledge_amount FROM pledges WHERE fulfilled = true
SELECT * FROM pledges WHERE pledge_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT pledge_amount, pledge_date FROM pledges WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_pledges FROM pledges GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_pledges > 1
SELECT * FROM pledges WHERE fulfilled = TRUE ORDER BY pledge_amount DESC, pledge_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT pledge_id, user_id FROM pledges WHERE pledge_amount > 1000 AND fulfilled = FALSE
SELECT user_id, SUM(pledge_amount) AS total_pledged FROM pledges GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM pledges WHERE pledge_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM pledges WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY pledge_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM pledges WHERE pledge_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM pledges WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM rewards WHERE fulfillment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT reward_name FROM rewards WHERE reward_id = 3;
SELECT pledge_id, COUNT(*) AS num_pledges FROM pledges GROUP BY pledge_id HAVING num_pledges > 1;
SELECT * FROM pledges WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY pledge_date DESC;
SELECT reward_name, fulfillment_date FROM rewards WHERE pledge_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_pledges, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM pledges;
SELECT reward_name, fulfillment_date FROM rewards ORDER BY fulfillment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_pledges FROM pledges GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM pledges;
SELECT pledge_id, user_id, amount, pledge_date FROM pledges WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT reward_name, redemption_status FROM rewards WHERE redemption_status = true;
SELECT reward_id, fulfillment_date FROM fulfillment ORDER BY fulfillment_date DESC;
SELECT pledge_id, amount FROM pledges WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM pledges INNER JOIN rewards ON pledges.pledge_id = rewards.pledge_id WHERE pledges.amount > 1000 ORDER BY pledges.pledge_date DESC;

SELECT pledges.user_id, rewards.reward_name, fulfillment.fulfillment_date FROM pledges LEFT JOIN rewards ON pledges.pledge_id = rewards.pledge_id INNER JOIN fulfillment ON rewards.reward_id = fulfillment.reward_id WHERE fulfillment.delivery_method = 'mail' ORDER BY fulfillment.fulfillment_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT rewards.reward_name, pledges.amount FROM rewards LEFT JOIN pledges ON rewards.pledge_id = pledges.pledge_id ORDER BY pledges.amount DESC;

SELECT pledges.user_id, rewards.reward_name, fulfillment.fulfillment_date FROM pledges INNER JOIN rewards ON pledges.pledge_id = rewards.pledge_id INNER JOIN fulfillment ON rewards.reward_id = fulfillment.reward_id WHERE pledges.amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 AND fulfillment.delivery_method = 'pickup' ORDER BY pledges.user_id, fulfillment.fulfillment_date DESC;

SELECT pledges.user_id, COUNT(rewards.reward_id) AS total_rewards FROM pledges LEFT JOIN rewards ON pledges.pledge_id = rewards.pledge_id GROUP BY pledges.user_id HAVING total_rewards > 1 ORDER BY total_rewards DESC, pledges.user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM pledges;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM pledges WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT description, fulfillment_date FROM rewards ORDER BY fulfillment_date DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, reward_id, claim_date FROM user_rewards WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM pledges WHERE pledge_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM pledges WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM pledges GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) FROM pledges GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 5000;
SELECT u.name, r.description FROM users u JOIN user_rewards ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN rewards r ON ur.reward_id = r.reward_id;
SELECT * FROM Pledges ORDER BY pledge_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT pledge_id, user_id, amount FROM Pledges WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE total_points >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM Fulfillments WHERE fulfillment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT reward_name, description, points_required FROM Rewards ORDER BY points_required ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pledges;
SELECT user_id, amount, pledge_date FROM Pledges WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY pledge_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, total_points FROM Users WHERE total_points >= 5000;
SELECT r.reward_id, r.reward_name, u.username FROM Rewards r JOIN Users u ON r.points_required <= u.total_points;
SELECT p.pledge_id, r.reward_name, fr.fulfillment_date FROM Pledges p JOIN Fulfillments fr ON p.pledge_id = fr.pledge_id JOIN Rewards r ON fr.reward_id = r.reward_id;
